Sock as a plant holder: Cut off the toes of the sock and use the remaining part as a small planter for succulents or small plants.
Sock as a dust cloth: Use the sock to clean hard-to-reach areas like fans, vents, and other small spaces.
Sock as a pet toy: Tie a knot in the end of the sock and give it to your pet to chew on or play with.
Sock as a DIY phone case: Wrap the sock around your phone and secure it with a rubber band to create a protective case.
Sock as a DIY phone stand: Fold the sock in half and place your phone inside to create a makeshift phone stand.
